studyMetadata.title: Experiment 1.2 – Group Footnotes
studyMetadata.description: Follow-up study for participants from the Experiment 1 footnote group, exposing them to visualization badges and comparing badges vs. footnotes.

badge-questionaire-2.description: Preference and post-task Likert questionnaire about visualization badges (compared to footnotes)
badge-questionaire-2.instruction:
### Please compare the two versions and answer the questions below.

In the table, the **left** column shows the versions with **footnotes** (as in your previous study). The **right** column shows the versions with **visualization badges** (as you just explored).

| Footnotes version | Badges version |
| --- | --- |
| ![Global warming with footnotes](mind-the-badge/assets/stimuli-global-warming-projection/grp-footnotes/source.png) | ![Global warming with badges](mind-the-badge/assets/stimuli-global-warming-projection/grp-badges/source.png) |
| ![CO₂ emissions with footnotes](mind-the-badge/assets/stimuli-co2-emissions/grp-footnotes/source.png) | ![CO₂ emissions with badges](mind-the-badge/assets/stimuli-co2-emissions/grp-badges/source.png) |

response.prompt: Looking at the visualizations above, **which version do you prefer overall**?
options: I prefer the version with footnotes
I prefer the version with visualization badges
